Issue.creator: spivachuk
Issue.summary: Create reporting tool for system tests
Issue.description: The full procedure of run of all the system tests must include generating a report artifact. This report must contain the same information as "Acceptance Matrix" tab of "Test Matrix - RC - Sovrin - INDY" spreadsheet (https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/12k8kdQ4gnHBZbg36RkACmj1lpzuWqyQRL8fKzE1OvXA) contains now.
